```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, comment = NA,
                      options(digits = 3, scipen = 999))
library(tidyverse)
library(plm)
library(stargazer)
df <- # data
  here::here("data", "covid_data_final.csv") %>% 
  read_csv()

sc_names <-
  df %>%
  names() 

soc_cap_measures <- sc_names[c(14:17, 46:53)]
```



# Table 1

```{r table-1}
stargazer(
  df %>%
    plm(
      cases_new ~ stringency_index_lag * state_level_index +
        I(stringency_index_lag ^ 2),
      data = .,
      effect = "time",
      index = "state",
      model = "within"
    ),
  df %>%
    plm(
      cases_new ~ stringency_index_lag * state_level_index +
        I(stringency_index_lag ^ 2),
      data = .,
      effect = "twoways",
      index = "state",
      method = "within"
    ),
  df %>%
    plm(
      cases_new ~ stringency_index_lag * state_level_index +
        I(stringency_index_lag ^ 2) +
        median_household_income +
        percent_adults_with_ba +
        percent_in_fair_or_poor_health +
        percent_black +
        density +
        percent_rural +
        percent_65 +
        average_temperature +
        governor_political_affiliation,
      data = .,
      effect = "time",
      index = "state",
      model = "within"
    ),
  df %>%
    plm(
      cases_new ~ stringency_index_lag * state_level_index  +
        I(stringency_index_lag ^ 2) +
        average_temperature +
        governor_political_affiliation +
        percent_in_fair_or_poor_health |
        median_household_income +
        percent_adults_with_ba +
        percent_black +
        density +
        percent_rural +
        percent_65 +
        average_temperature +
        governor_political_affiliation +
        percent_in_fair_or_poor_health +
        stringency_index_lag +
        I(stringency_index_lag) ^ 2,
      data = .,
      effect = "time",
      index = "state",
      model = "within"
    ),
  type = "html"
)
```

# Table 2

```{r table-2}
stargazer(
  df %>%
    plm(
      cases_new ~ stringency_index_lag * state_level_index +
        I(stringency_index_lag ^ 2),
      data = .,
      effect = "twoways",
      index = "state",
      method = "within"
    ),
  df %>%
    plm(
      cases_new ~ stringency_index_lag * family_unity +
        stringency_index_lag * family_interaction +
        stringency_index_lag * social_support +
        stringency_index_lag * community_health +
        stringency_index_lag * institutional_health +
        stringency_index_lag * collective_efficacy +
        stringency_index_lag * philanthropic_health +
        I(stringency_index_lag ^ 2),
      data = .,
      effect = "twoways",
      index = "state",
      method = "within"
    ),
  type = "html"
)
```

# Table 3

```{r table-3}
table_3_models <- list()

for (i in 1:4) {
  # for(i in 1:1)  {
  # sc_i <- soc_cap_measures[i]
  
  table_3_models[[i]] <-
    df %>%
    plm(
      cases_new ~ stringency_index_lag * get(soc_cap_measures[i]) +
        I(stringency_index_lag ^ 2),
      data = .,
      effect = "twoways",
      index = "state",
      model = "within"
    ) 
}

names(table_3_models) <- soc_cap_measures[1:4]


stargazer(table_3_models, 
          type = "html", 
          model.names = TRUE
          )
```
